page.title: 06A DAY AT THE RACES,TWEEDBANK
page.content: On the 5th of June the{MINI OLYMPICS were held at{TWEEDBANK}stadium.The track was opened in{1984.}It has 8 lanes which are 400 metres long.The track is made of rubber which is red. In the middle of the track there are two long jumps,a water jump,high jump,hurdles,shotputt and 60 metres, 150 metres and 300 metres flat race. There is a stand on the outside of the track.It has a roof on it.When you come into the track grounds there are toilets and changing rooms.The events which take place at the stadium are attended by competitors from all over the{BORDERS}and{SCOTLAND.}When I was running on the track,at the Mini Olympics it felt as if you were in the air.I think we are very lucky to have a track because important people run on tracks like ours for the real Olympics.An exciting day at the track!
